Package com.payd.shooti.math

Class LerpFloat

java.lang.Object
com.payd.shooti.math.LerpValue<Float>
com.payd.shooti.math.LerpFloat
public class LerpFloat extends LerpValue<Float>
LerpFloat is a utility class for linear interpolation of float values.

Lerp time (speed) is a value greater than 0, less than or equal to 1, where a lower number is a slower lerp.

Consider the speed parameter a multiplier of the divisor applied when calculating the difference between the target and the current, which is applied to the translation.

If no speed is provided in the constructor, the default value of 0.25f will be applied to interpolations which don't hae a speed defined. (2016-08-23) LerpFloat supports Interpolation parameter in constructor or lerp invocation. LerpFloat returns float current float value for LerpValue.lerp(float, com.badlogic.gdx.math.Interpolation) and lerpTo(java.lang.Float, float, float, com.badlogic.gdx.math.Interpolation) methods.
Since:
2.0-24 (2024-05-26) Converted class to be an extension of LerpValue, abstracting many functionalities.
